entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 2:57PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...High Water On Most Rivers This Week... Rapid snowmelt in the Brooks Range is causing water levels to rise on many rivers draining the south side of the Brooks Range. Larger rivers such as the the Colleen, the Sheenjek, the Chandalar and the Koyukuk, and their tributaries, all have high water. There is a risk of minor flooding this week along all of these
entry.cap:areaDesc: Southeastern Brooks Range; Upper Koyukuk Valley

entry.summary: ...High Water Continues Along the Yukon River And Lower Nowitna Rivers... The ice jam near the Kokrines Bible Camp broke early Sunday morning and water levels dropped along the Yukon River and Lower Nowitna River.
